plot: John Oliver explains why some people don't want to get the Covid-19 vaccine and how they might be reassured. (Even you, Mike in Baltimore.)

John talks about Covid-19 vaccines and why people are hesitant to get the vaccine shot. He points out the reasons behind their hesitancy and answered some valid concerns as well as some totally absurd ones. He closed the piece with some advice for the government twitter accounts .—Niaz Islam Arif
